title: TeamViewer abused to breach networks in new ransomware attacks
description: Ransomware actors are again using TeamViewer to gain initial access to organization endpoints and attempt to deploy encryptors based on the leaked LockBit ransomware builder. [...]

title: CISA: Critical Ivanti auth bypass bug now actively exploited
description: CISA warns that a critical authentication bypass vulnerability in Ivanti's Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) and MobileIron Core device management software (patched in August 2023) is now under active exploitation. [...]

title: Microsoft tests instant access to Android photos in Windows 11
description: Microsoft plans to provide Windows 11 users with almost instant access to photos and screenshots they've taken on their Android smartphones. [...]

title: Kansas State University cyberattack disrupts IT network and services
description: Kansas State University (K-State) announced it is managing a cybersecurity incident that has disrupted certain network systems, including VPN, K-State Today emails, and video services on Canvas and Mediasite. [...]

title: Haier hits Home Assistant plugin dev with takedown notice
description: Appliances giant Haier reportedly issued a takedown notice to a software developer for creating Home Assistant integration plugins for the company's home appliances and releasing them on GitHub. [...]

title: US govt wants BreachForums admin sentenced to 15 years in prison
description: The United States government has recommended that Conor Brian Fitzpatrick, the creator and lead administrator of the now-defunct BreachForums hacking forums, receive a sentence of 15 years in prison. [...]

title: Credentials are Still King: Leaked Credentials, Data Breaches and Dark Web Markets
description: Learn how threat actors utilize credentials to break into privileged IT infrastructure to create data breaches and distribute ransomware. [...]

title: Google: Russian FSB hackers deploy new Spica backdoor malware
description: Google says the ColdRiver Russian-backed hacking group is pushing previously unknown backdoor malware using payloads masquerading as a PDF decryption tool. [...]

title: Docker hosts hacked in ongoing website traffic theft scheme
description: A new campaign targeting vulnerable Docker services deploys an XMRig miner and the 9hits viewer app on compromised hosts, allowing a dual monetization strategy. [...]

title: Jira down: Atlassian outage affecting multiple cloud services
description: Multiple Atlassian Jira products are experiencing an ongoing outage as of this morning. Users of Jira Work management, Jira Software, Jira Service Management and Jira Product Discovery are facing connection issues. [...]
